channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 22:51 Air alarm to the Chernihiv region follow the following messages.
item.description: 游댮 22:51 Air alarm to the Chernihiv region follow the following messages.#Chernihiv_Bost This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 22:00 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!
item.description: 游댮 22:00 The threat of shelling! Now in Pokrovskaya territorial community artillery shelling. Put in shelter!#Pokrovskaya_ territorial This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游리 21:54 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community
item.description: 游리 21:54 Auxiliary in the Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note that the alarm is still in:- Manganese and Marganetsky Territorial Community- Nikopol and Nikopol Territorial Community- Chervono-Grigorivska Territorial Community#Dnipropetrovsk_. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
